text: John Ventimiglia (born July 17, 1963) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Artie Bucco in the HBO television series The Sopranos (1999â€“2007) and Dino Arbogast in the CBS series Blue Bloods. Ventimiglia was born in the Ridgewood neighborhood of Queens, New York City. He comes from a Sicilian- American family. He grew up in Teaneck, New Jersey. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from Queens Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
